    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public AuthHelper.AuthenticationStatus authenticate(AuthState state)
                                             throws IOException,
                                                    NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Authenticate.
        Parameters:
        state - the state.
        Returns:
        status.
        Throws:
        IOException - on error.
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if there isn't a supported algorithm for digest authentication.

      • getDataStore

        public AuthDataStore getDataStore()
        Get the DataStore.
        Returns:
        the DataStore.

      • getRequestWrapper

        public HttpServletRequest getRequestWrapper(AuthState state)
        Get a request wrapper with the realm and user filled in.
        Parameters:
        state - the state.
        Returns:
        the request.

      • getState

        public AuthState getState(HttpServletRequest request,
                 HttpServletResponse response)
        Get state for helper.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        Returns:
        the state or null if the URL cannot/shouldn't be authenticated because there is no realm.

      • isIPValid

        public boolean isIPValid(AuthState state)
        Return true if the IP is valid.
        Parameters:
        state - the state.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • requestAuthentication

        public void requestAuthentication(AuthState state)
                           throws IOException,
                                  NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Request authentication. This should only be called if authenticate(AuthState) was called and returned AuthHelper.AuthenticationStatus.not_authenticated.
        Parameters:
        state - the state.
        Throws:
        IOException - on error.
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - on error.
